entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:36AM EST by NWS
entry.summary: Areas of fog, locally dense, will affect portions of southern Connecticut overnight. Visibilities will generally run 1/2 to 1 mile, with some areas down to 1/4 mile or less at times. If driving, be prepared for changeable and suddenly reduced visibilities. Proceed with extra caution, drive slowly and allow for extra space between vehicles. Also, use low beam headlights.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 4:35AM EST by NWS
